SEARCH
Package gw.currency.fxrate

Interface FXRateContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
ExchangeRateInUseDelegate, ExchangeRateInUseDelegateMethods, FXRate
All Known Implementing Classes:
BulkInvoiceExchangeRateInUse, ClaimToReportingExchangeRateInUse, DefaultFXRate, ExchangeRateInUseDelegateMethodsImpl, FXRateContextImpl, FXRateImpl, RIClaimToReportingExchangeRateInUse, TransToClaimExchangeRateInUse, TransToReservingExchangeRateInUse
public interface FXRateContext
Interface for FXRateContext. FXRateContext is a container for the input fields which the FXRateService requires to obtain a FXRate. Also, as a member of a FXRate, FXRateContext is a container for the fields which the FXRateService used to obtain a FXRate. FromCurrency -- Currency -- The currency to be "sold" ToCurrency -- Currency -- The currency to be "bought" Market-- typekey -- The FXRateMarket for which the rate applies, field-defined values indicate a custom rate MarketTime-- datetime -- The requested market time

    • getToCurrency

    • getMarket

      FXRateMarket getMarket()
      Returns:
      The market for which the rate applies

    • getMarketTime

      Date getMarketTime()
      Returns:
      Either the requested market time, or the point in time when the market indicated the rate was applicable

    • getBaseCurrency

      default Currency getBaseCurrency()
      The base currency for the foreign exchange conversion.

      By default returns CurrencyUtil.getDefaultCurrency().

      Returns:
      The base currency for the foreign exchange conversion
